about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-BT01/SP01 Vairina Valiente
- D-BT01/SP02 Heavy Artillery of Dust Storm, Eugene
- D-BT01/SP03 Master of Gravity, Baromagnes
- D-BT01/SP04 Diabolos Boys, Eden
- D-BT01/SP05 Cardinal Deus, Orfist
- D-BT01/SP06 Aurora Battle Princess, Agra Rouge
- D-BT01/SP07 Grand Heavenly Sword, Alden
- D-BT01/SP08 Hexaorb Sorceress
- D-BT01/SP09 Mysterious Rain Spiritualist, Zorga
- D-BT01/SP10 Sylvan Horned Beast, Giunosla
- D-BT01/SP11 Vairina Arcs
- D-BT01/SP12 Stealth Dragon, Tensha Stead
- D-BT01/SP13 Dragon Deity King of Resurgence, Dragveda
- D-BT01/SP14 Upward Acrobat, Marjorie
- D-BT01/SP15 Steam Battler, Gungnram
- D-BT01/SP16 Hades Dragon Deity of Resentment, Gallmageheld
- D-BT01/SP17 Hyperspeed Robo, Chevalstud
- D-BT01/SP18 Detonation Monster, Bobalmine
- D-BT01/SP19 Star Dragon Deity of Infinitude, Eldobreath
- D-BT01/SP20 Knight of War Damage, Fosado
- D-BT01/SP21 Painkiller Angel
- D-BT01/SP22 Light Dragon Deity of Honors, Amartinoa
- D-BT01/SP23 Inheritance Maiden, Hendrina
- D-BT01/SP24 Spurring Maiden, Ellenia
- D-BT01/SP25 Source Dragon Deity of Blessings, Blessfavor
- D-BT01/SP26 Twin Buckler Dragon
- D-BT01/SP27 Recusal Hate Dragon
- D-BT01/SP28 Violate Dragon
- D-BT01/SP29 Aegismare Dragon
- D-BT01/SP30 Planar Prevent Dragon
- D-BT01/SP31 Cardinal Noid, Cubisia
- D-BT01/SP32 Cardinal Noid, Routis
- D-BT01/SP33 Cardinal Fang, Phovi
- D-BT01/SP34 Cardinal Draco, Barbizonde
- D-BT01/SP35 Cardinal Prima, Nabilem
- D-BT01/SP36 Black Tears Husk Dragon
- D-BT01/SP37 Rancor Chain
- D-BT01/SP38 Dream Nibbling
- D-BT01/SP39 Abyss Temptation
- D-BT01/SP40 Elegy Pixy

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
